employees.notes: Proff lists 235 employees for the selected legal entity.[1]

revenue.notes: Proff reports 2024 operating revenue as 1 116 719 with amounts stated in thousands (NOK), converted here to NOK 1,116,719,000.[1]

company.entity_resolution_notes: Name disambiguation was required: another Norwegian company with the same name appears with org. no. 980 015 998 (Førde).[5] This report selects the Skanska-linked Entreprenørservice AS with org. no. 911 469 138, confirmed by Proff and Skanska’s organization-number table.[1][2]

srm_assessment.overall_summary: Reviewed company/group descriptions identify business activities (boring, fundamentering, sprøytebetong) but provide no concrete evidence of inbound recycled/recovered/waste-derived material or energy inputs used by the company.[3][4]
gaps_and_uncertainties: Publicly reviewed sources here are company profile/about pages and registry-style information; they do not disclose procurement-level input composition.[1][3][4]
No quantified inbound SRM data (mass, volume, energy, or input share) was found in the reviewed sources.[3][4]
